attributes.action: Grant The People of Northern Ireland A Referendum on Whether They Wish to Remain Under British Rule, Or If They Would Rather See Ireland United Once Again, With All Management Of The Provence of Ulster Coming from Dublin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the occupied 6 counties of Ulster that is known as Northern Ireland is still under British Rule, it is only right that those who are living there have their voices heard. 
With the problems of Devolution being obvious, it is only right that all of N.I's citizens should have the right to say that they want to continue with Direct Rule from London, or have the border done away with, and re-unite the Island of Ireland once again.
